title: Diego's Arctic Rescue (Go Diego Go
description: Diego and his cousin Dora the Explorer help return a pair of baby polar bears to their mother. Readers will love learning fun trivia facts about polar bears and will cheer Diego and Dora on as they rescue the polar bear cubs. Alicia and Baby Jaguar help save the day, too! Based on the episode, Diego's Arctic Rescue Mission.
author: Erica David
